metadata.name: Pocket Microverse #1
metadata.description: According to legend, these micro universes were created by a group of advanced alien civilizations who sought to preserve their worlds and knowledge for future generations. Over time, these micro universes have been sought after by collectors and adventurers from all corners of the galaxy. Each one is said to contain its own secrets and wonders, waiting to be unlocked by those who possess the skills and knowledge to do so. Now, these micro universes are available to you in the form of NFTs.
